alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 09 at 6:57PM MST until April 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, wind speeds continue to decrease below criteria this evening allowing the Wind Advisory to expire on time. Winds will remain breezy through this evening, becoming lighter overnight. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of the Little Colorado River Valley including Winslow, Holbrook, Snowflake, Saint Johns, Eagar, and Springerville. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 7 PM MST this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from Monday afternoon through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County
